changes: Changed the processing of command input to the console, fixed some visual bugs

Fixed a bug due to which the line breaks with "
" in the kick and send commands did not work
Added built-in integration with ngrok, now you don't need to download and run it separately
Added a configuration file, now the settings of some functions (for example, the log file mcmdlogger.log) are not reset upon restart
New "deaf" command, that allows to hide all new server chat messages from the player
New "banip" command, that allows to block access to the fake server from certain ips
